import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Product from '../components/Product' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import data from '../data' function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find((x => x._id === props.match.params.id)) return (
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
) } export default ProductScreen
